title: "Signagelive deploys AI to auto-translate speech in videos"
excerpt: "Signagelive has launched a service that uses AI to automatically translate speech in videos into different languages. The service utilises the Synthesia program to allow users to create an AI avatar and to optimise the content of an intranet blog post or SharePoint article for screen use."
